awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: An old Chinese gentleman rides into the town of Abalone, Arizona and changes it forever, as the citizens see themselves reflected in the mirror of Lao's mysterious circus of mythical beasts.
plot: A mysterious circus comes to a western town bearing wonders and characters that entertain the inhabitants and teach valuable lessons.
title: 7 Faces of Dr. Lao
